title: 12/24/20 – HOUR 2 – Tony Dungy Is A Back Peddler, PLUS Ben Volin!
itunes:title: 12/24/20 – HOUR 2 – Tony Dungy Is A Back Peddler, PLUS Ben Volin!
description:
With Rob Parker and T.J. Houshmandzadeh in for Dan Patrick, the guys debate whether or not Tony Dungy was correct in ranking Tom Brady the sixth-best quarterback of all-time. They share their favorite Christmas memories including the most festive team that T.J. played on during his caeer. Plus, they are joined by Ben Volin of The Boston Globe about who won the divorce: Tom Brady or Bill Belichick?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
